00025 #ifndef _BASE_UNARYOPEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_UNARYOPEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/ExpressionNode>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 //
00036 // Super class of all unary operator experssions
00037 //
00038 
00039 class UnaryOpExpression : public ExpressionNode
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   UnaryOpExpression(ref<ExpressionNode> arg)
00043     : arg(arg) {}
00044   UnaryOpExpression(const UnaryOpExpression& e)
00045     : arg(e.arg) {}
00046 
00047   virtual void serialize(Serializer& s) { s.baseRef(arg,"arg"); }
00048 
00049 protected:
00050   UnaryOpExpression() {}
00051 
00052   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const = 0; ///< perform evaluation with params and sore in value (& set valueCached true)
00053   virtual void resetCache() const { valueCached=false; arg->resetCache(); }
00054 
00055   virtual void cacheDerivative(Int withRespectToIndex) const = 0; ///< perform differentiation and cache in derivative (& set set derivCached)
00056   virtual void resetDerivCached() const { derivCached=false; arg->resetDerivCached(); derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>(0); }
00057 
00058   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00059     { arg->operationCounts(addsub,multdiv,trig); }
00060 
00061   ref<ExpressionNode> arg;
00062 
00063   friend class Expression;
00064 };
00065 
00066 } // base
00067 
00068 #endif
